text: Let A be an array of 100 integers and size of each integer is 4 bytes. The base address of A, 0x00000000, is stored in R1. The values of R4 and R2 are 100 and 65536, respectively. Consider the C language code for (i=0; i<100; i++) A[i] = 65536 + A[il; Which of the following is the correct assembly code of the above C language code? (a) LOOP: LW R3, 0(R1) (b) LOOP: LW R3, 0(R1) RDD R3, R2, R3 ADD R3, R2, R3 ADDI R1, R1, 4 sw R3, 0(R1) SW R3, 0(R1) ADDI R1, R1, 4 BE R1, R4, LOOP BE R1, R4, LOOP (c) LW R3, 0(R1) (d) LOOP: LW R3, 0(R1) LOOP: ADD R3, R2, R3 ADD R3, R2, R3 SW R3, 0(R1) SW R3, 0(R1) ADDI R1, R1, 4 ADDI R1, R1, 4 BNE R1, R4, LOOP BNE R1, R4, LOOP
